description.displayText:
Melissa has been an awesome nanny for our girl since 2019! She's super dedicated and totally professional. Our child loves her and feels safe and happy around her. Plus, she goes the extra mile by helping take care of our dog too. Melissa truly goes above and beyond for both our family and our furry friend. 
She's the best! Highly recommend her if you want someone loving and trustworthy for your child and pet.
description.originalText:

description.displayText: Melissa is a wonderful, positive, vibrant young lady with a true passion and dedication to her work. We hired Melissa in 2011 to look after our young children as well as our house upkeep and pet care. She did a tremendous job every day to fulfil her duties with quality work and care. My kids absolutely fell in love with her and loved seeing 'Missy' every day. She worked with us from 2011-2014 and we regret that we had to move and no longer could use her services. Highly recommend her to any families.
description.originalText: Melissa is a wonderful, positive, vibrant young lady with a true passion and dedication to her work. Highly recommend her to any families.

description.displayText: You'd have taken one of the best decision for your kid if you choose her as your kid's care taker. Melissa is full of love! She is very affectionate and takes great care of them. Can't talk enough to play and fun times with kids with activities like singing, dancing, puzzle time, etc. Enjoys taking them outdoors to park, library etc. More importantly, she deals with them patiently, helps in training them aligning with the parents/kid's goals and also provides additional inputs as necessary. She is also a great resource when it comes to disciplining and help bring good manners and etiquette in children. Communicates every detail that a parent would want to know about their child. Very professional in her interactions. You will thank me later if you hire her.
